metadata.title: CVE-2017-11428 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: OneLogin Ruby-SAML 1.6.0 and earlier may incorrectly utilize the results of XML DOM traversal and canonicalization APIs in such a way that an attacker may be able to manipulate the SAML data without invalidating the cryptographic signature, allowing the attack to potentially bypass authentication to SAML service providers.

criterions.comment: ruby-saml package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.2-1').
